page.title: 10ECOLOGY
page.content: In this area the main use of the land is for agricultural farming,which consist of arable farming and live stock farming. The main crops produced from the land are wheat,barley and oil_seed rape. As well as the arable farming most farmers keep livestock as well,for something to fall back on if the crops fail. As a result of this the area is made up of very large areas of grazing land ,with some fields as large as{20} acres. There is also an extensive network of public footpaths and bridalways.
